review: It's a great device. I love that I can disconnect and reconnect to any of the TVs in my home. However, I found that when I connect my Firestick to my Samsung 40" SmartTV it keeps shutting on and Off and resetting Itself. Amazon should be a bit more clear on what TVs are compatible without this issue. I can still watch it, but it's frustration when the movie gets Juicy and then It's a Black screen.
author: All4Selene "Shirley E. Martinez"

review: It doesn't do youtube well, and jitters a lot in the UI

review: The only downside is that it has to be plugged into power. The pictures don't show this. So not exactly as shown. Shame on Amazon. But if you can get passed that problem and have a really good High Speed Internet it works great. You can search for Prime content, something you couldn't do with the Fire Box.

review: Brilliant device.  A digital TV antenna and the Fire TV Stick meets all my TV needs.  Bye bye cable.One very minor criticism would be the bizarre difficulty in opening the back of the remote to install the batteries.  Hardly a new concept but the designers somehow managed to botch this up.
